products.title: Geometric Metallic Sterling Grey Roman Blind
products.description: A fantastic neutral, this textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. Your new geometric metallic sterling silver roman blind, blends a striking silver shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Zambezi 25mm Anthracite Grey Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A bold dark grey shade, this zambezi anthracite perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Grey shades are not only clean and trend-setting, but can be either complimented with co-ordinating accessories, or can be the background to a more bolder colour palette. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors.
